nodes.bodyText: If the string doesn't contain "_" or "-", can it be decoded with any of these methods and will they produce the same results?

Yes. The alphabets are in the same order, the only difference is this substitution. If they don't contain these character (_ or - or + or /), then any decoder will work. We want to prefer the MIME decoder as it is the most flexible (w.r.t. whitespace), but use the URL decoder when we need it.

I think these aren't originally from the same data. Could we use the data below and compare the decoded data to make sure they match?
URL-safe Base64:
MIICjDCCAXQCAQIwADCCASIwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEBBQADggEPADCCAQoCggEBALdt
